price: Sọ ìtàn (Ànábì) Mūsā tí ó wà nínú al-Ƙur’ān. Dájúdájú ó jẹ́ ẹni-ẹ̀ṣà, ó jẹ́ Òjíṣẹ́, (ó tún jẹ́) Ànábì.
arabic: وَٱذۡكُرۡ فِي ٱلۡكِتَٰبِ مُوسَىٰٓۚ إِنَّهُۥ كَانَ مُخۡلَصٗا وَكَانَ رَسُولٗا نَّبِيّٗا

version.title: Yoruba translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Yoruba by Abu Rahima Mikhail Aikweiny, printed in 1432 H.

meta.transliteration: wa-udh'kur fī al-kitābi mūsā innahu kāna mukh'laṣan wakāna rasūlan nabiyyan
